poem:
### Lines on a Striking Journey

Dream of rails, derailed,
Tracks whispering in autumn's breath—
Steel birds in skies connive with clouds.

Stranded on echoes,
we weigh the wings of time against
the stillness of iron.

Journey plans in limbo,
while somewhere far a bird-song
paints the horizon serene.
